name: ZXing.Net.Core
title: ZXing .Net Core
description: Partial port of ZXing.Net on .Net Core.

packOptions.summary: .Net Core port of ZXing.Net barcode reader/writer library (base classes only).
packOptions.releaseNotes: Partial porting of the core/common classes to .Net Core (Experimental). Note: This package does NOT contain barcode encoding/decocing functionalites. It merely contains core/common classes.
